text:
I had look at your website.  1st let me say congratulations , you are already going after the things you need to always keep developing to became a better artist .
live drawing , drawing , photography are the best tools to develop your eye and understanding of the world , by colour , texture , composition , lighting ....
What are you currently developing with substance painter ? 
Are you familiar with PBR shader in substance ? 
Have a great weekend !
